LanguageData.ChjPlayerAndroidColony.label: New Android Arrivals
LanguageData.ChjAndroidEnclave.label: android enclave
LanguageData.ChjAndroidEnclave.description: A collection of android enclaves which are eeking out an existence out on the rim. Freed from their previous lives they now try to co-exist with outlanders and try to help anyone whom crashland on the planet.\n\nA idealistic collection of Androids who do their best to make the rim better.
